# cmccloudv2_server (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get server by id
data "cmccloudv2_server" "server1" {  
    server_id = "44fa95ef-5b29-4c81-840f-c2ae310cdbdd"
}

# get server by name
data "cmccloudv2_server" "server1" {  
    name = "ecs-jw73"
}

# get server by ip_address
data "cmccloudv2_server" "server1" {  
    ip_address = "192.168.0.13"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ip_address` (String) Filter by ip address of server
- `name` (String)
- `server_id` (String) Id of the server
- `status` (String) filter by server status (case-insensitive)
- `vm_state` (String) filter by vm_state (case-insensitive)
- `zone` (String) filter by server zone that contains this text (case-insensitive)

### Read-Only

- `cpu` (Number)
- `created_at` (String)
- `flavor_name` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ram` (Number)
